welcome.p1: Welcome to my website! My name is Eugene Ohvatuk (nickname SBV) and I've been doing web development for more than a year. My main technology stack is React. I try to create web applications that are beautiful, easy to use and as efficient as possible.
welcome.p2: On this website I present my work and experiments in web development. Here you can read about my projects and learn more about how I work.
welcome.p3: Be assured that no personal information is collected on my site. If you have any questions, feel free to contact me by email ohvatuki@gmail.com.
welcome.p4: Thanks for visiting my site, I hope you find a lot of interesting things here!

content.p1: I'm a Frontend developer with more than 1 year of web development experience (non-commercial experience). I love to develop beautiful and adaptive websites using semantic tags. I know HTML, CSS (also SASS preprocessor), JavaScript (including ES6 syntax). In the last half year, I've been writing applications using React and Redux libraries. At the moment I am learning TypeScript.
content.p2: I have experience in writing server side applications (API) using Node.js and Express framework. I have some knowledge in SQL, such as database creation and SQL querying (I used PostgreSQL for my own purposes). List of recent projects can be seen at the very bottom.
content.p3: Soon I will finish college (4th year) and hope to find my first job.
